content:
Hi All,

The Global AI Ethics Consortium (GAIEC) and the Institute for Ethics in Artificial Intelligence are very excited to announce the launch of the GAIEC Repository. The GAIEC Repository has the goal of promoting research on AI ethics and making this information more easily available to all. It centralizes data, publications and other work from our members and those working on AI ethics, broadly.

More information:
-The GAIEC Repository-https://lnkd.in/dTQbW7i
-The Global AI Ethics Consortium: https://lnkd.in/eJrVME6
-The Institute for Ethics in Artificial Intelligence: https://ieai.mcts.tum.de/

You can send your questions or contributions to: gaiec@mcts.tum.de

Best wishes,

Anastasia Aritzi

Home - Institute for Ethics in Artificial Intelligence
Manuela Fuchs2021-02-11T13:07:24+01:00February 11th, 2021|
sender_full_name: Anastasia Aritzi (Institute for Ethics in AI, DE)
